segments.text: I had a look yesterday . I found some exhibits are fine in quality and beautiful in design . The exhibition has successfully displayed to me what your corporation handles . I have gone over the catalogue and the pamphlets enclosed in your last letter . I have got some idea of your exports . I am interested in your silk blouses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our silks are known for their quality . They are one of our traditional exports . Silk blouses are brightly colored and beautifully designed . They are greatly favored overseas and are always in great demand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some of them are of the latest style . Now I have a feeling that we can do a lot of trade in this line . We wish to establish business relationship with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Concerning our financial position , credit standing and trade reputation , you may refer to our bank.or to our local chamber of commerce or inquiry agencies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your information . As you know , our corporation is a state-operated one . We always trade with foreign countries on the basis of equality and mutual benefit . I have no doubt that it will bring about benefit between us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds interesting ! I'll send a fax . As soon as I receive the definite answer , I'll give you a special answer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will make an offer as soon as possible . I hope a lot of business will be put through between us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope everything will be smooth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is what I want to say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will give you the lowest price in the future .
segments.speaker: S2
